title: Schedule
content:
Schedule # * Note: Here is the plan for the semester. The schedule is tentative and subject to change.
You can find homework solutions on Canvas.
Date Lecture Resources Notes Thu, 9/4 1: Course Overview and ‘What is a Robot’ N/A Tue, 9/9 2: Mechanisms and Configuration Spaces MR 2.1-2.3, 2.5 Thu, 9/11 3: Rigid Body Motion - 2D and Rotation Matrices MR 3.1-3.2 HW1 Released Tue, 9/16 4: Rigid Body Motion (3D) - Euler Angles and Axis-Angle MR 3.2 & A.B, AR 2.4.4 B Thu, 9/18 5: Quaternions and Rigid Body Motion (3D) - Transformations MR A.B., AR 2.4.4 B, MR 3.3 Tue, 9/23 6: More Examples and Rigid Body Motion MR A.B., AR 2.4.4 B, MR 3.3 Thu, 9/25 7: Forward Kinematics and URDFs MR 4, 4.2 Tue, 9/30 8: Forward Kinematics and DH Parameters MR A.C HW1 Due (5pm) Thu, 10/2 9: Forward Kinematics and Differential Kinematics MR 5.0, AR 3.3, Spong Robot Modeling and Control Ch 4 Tue, 10/7 10: Inverse Kinematics MR 6, 6.2, AR 3.4 HW2 Released Thu, 10/9 11: Intro to Planning and Graph-based Methods MR 10.2 Tue, 10/14 12: Sample-based Planning Methods MR 10.5 Thu, 10/16 13: Trajectory Generation and Trajectory Optimization MR 9.1-9.3 Tue, 10/21 14: Trajectory Optimization Matthew Kelley’s Trajectory Optimization Tutorials, TrajOpt Exercise HW2 Due (5pm), HW3 Released Thu, 10/23 15: Hierarchy and FSMs (and Project Introduction) AR 11.2-11.4 Final Project Released Tue, 10/28 16: Perception AR 7.1, 8 Thu, 10/30 17: Uncertainty and State Estimation Fundamentals PR 2.2-2.3 Tue, 11/4 18: Bayes Filters PR 2.4 HW3 Due (5pm) Thu, 11/6 19: Kalman Filters (and Midterm Discussion) PR 3.2-3.3 Project Proposal Due (5pm), Midterm Instructions & Practice Tue, 11/11 20: Particle Filters PR 4.2, 10.1 PF code Thu, 11/13 Midterm Exam Tue, 11/18 21: Feedback Control Introduction MR 11.1-11.2 HW4 Released Thu, 11/20 22: PID Control MR 11.2 Controls Code Tue, 11/25 23: Modern Techniques – Diffusion and VLA Models SayCan, Diffusion Policy, OpenVLA Thu, 11/27 No Class. Happy Thanksgiving! Tue, 12/2 24: Foundation Models - Discussion Flipped Class – watch this prior to class. Short Canvas submission after watching! Thu, 12/4 25: Guest Roboticist: Jason Ma HW4 Due (5pm) Tue, 12/9 26: Final Project Presentations Thu, 12/16 Final Project Due
